类 DefaultServiceConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.framework.dsb.service.DefaultServiceConfig
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    AnnotationAware, ServiceConfig

    public class DefaultServiceConfig
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceConfig, AnnotationAware
    This class search and maintain all service descriptor in the CLASSPATH,
    作者:
    David Yuan
